content: Have you checked with Charter? They may have changed their server setup. I say that because you indicated that mobile.charter.net is not familiar to you.

content: If you use the message pane (F8), then a single click does it.

content: Just to clarify: do these problems exist when you are not using the VPN? I ask that because VPN use is often the reason for problems such as you describe.
